mapper.update: merge into event_count_final as a using values (#{inst}, #{evt}, #{ymd}, #{hh}, #{mm}, #{total}, #{delta}) as b (inst, evt, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) on (a.inst = b.inst and a.evt = b.evt) when matched then update set ymd = b.ymd, hh = b.hh, mm = b.mm, total = b.total, delta = b.delta when not matched then insert (inst, evt, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) values (b.inst, b.evt, b.ymd, b.hh, b.mm, b.total, b.delta)
mapper.insert: merge into event_count as a using values (#{inst}, #{evt}, #{ymd}, #{hh}, #{mm}, #{total}, #{delta}) as b (inst, evt, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) on (a.inst = b.inst and a.evt = b.evt and a.ymd = b.ymd and a.hh = b.hh and a.mm = b.mm) when matched then update set total = b.total, delta = b.delta when not matched then insert (inst, evt, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) values (b.inst, b.evt, b.ymd, b.hh, b.mm, b.total, b.delta)
